parameters.name: portRanges
parameters.description: The TCP port ranges that a consumer can use to access a resource configuration. You can separate port ranges with a comma. Example: 1-65535 or 1,2,22-30 (string) ---

parameters.name: resourceConfigurationDefinition
parameters.description: The resource configuration. arnResource (dict) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource. arn (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource. dnsResource (dict) --- The DNS name of the resource. domainName (string) --- The domain name of the resource. ipAddressType (string) --- The type of IP address. ipResource (dict) --- The IP resource. ipAddress (string) --- The IP address of the IP resource.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of resource configuration.
SINGLE - A single resource.
GROUP - A group of resources.
CHILD - A single resource that is part of a group resource configuration.
ARN - An Amazon Web Services resource.
